description: Generate 80 sequential YouTube-lesson commits implementing the 'Build a Virtual Machine in JavaScript' curriculum. Each lesson is one commit with code + lesson.md. Follow commit format: feat(lesson): <NN> - <title>

instructions.high_level: For episodes 1 through 80, generate: (a) lesson markdown suitable for YouTube narration, (b) the minimal code files (HTML/CSS/JS) implementing examples/demos, (c) create a git commit per episode using the commit message format. Place each lesson under scripts/lessons/ and code under src/. Create demos in public/ and update README progressively.
instructions.episode_generation: Iterate episodes in numerical order. Use the provided Season markdowns as references for each episode's content. Each generated lesson.md must include: title, overview, step-by-step code walkthrough, on-screen demo notes, estimated transcript timestamps (chapter markers). Commit after each episode and append to timeline.json.
